Reviews.Content: regular customer cocos cabanas 10 location convenient door playa del carmen 5 min 20 mins airport unexpensive sophisticated staying cocos cabanas privacy resting excellent food private swimming pool beach access 600 ft stays usually 1 week single flying germany hosting provided owners silvia run business experience memeber family dinner cocos choice international food reasonable prices excelent service favorite lobster pizza signature chef helmut stay tried junior suite ocean view wich brand highly recommend cocos cabanas couples friends families business relaxation

Reviews.Content: 4th visit cocos delivered cocos owners sylvia helmut service topnotch food drink superb cabanas private cozy hammocks garden perfect afternoon siesta beach minute walk cool stay beaten path avoid allinclusive megaresort hang cocos
